about_the_game:
Take on the role of a safebreaker who must break as many codes as possible to safes located in a closed bank. There is not much time left, because it is already starting to dawn and the bank employees will soon appear.


Using your skills and hearing, you must decipher as many access codes to bank safes as possible and finally get to the large vault, where the main prize awaits - real gold and a huge amount of cash. Can you do it? Find out by entering the race against time.
detailed_description:
Take on the role of a safebreaker who must break as many codes as possible to safes located in a closed bank. There is not much time left, because it is already starting to dawn and the bank employees will soon appear.


Using your skills and hearing, you must decipher as many access codes to bank safes as possible and finally get to the large vault, where the main prize awaits - real gold and a huge amount of cash. Can you do it? Find out by entering the race against time.
name: Safebreaker

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win10
  • Processor: i3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: integrated
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win11
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: integrated

short_description: Take on the role of a safebreaker who must break as many codes as possible to safes located in a closed bank. There is not much time left. Using your skills and hearing, you must decipher as many access codes to bank safes as possible and finally get to the large vault, where the main prize awaits.
